website_summaries.verdict: Whether your cat prefers to lounge out in the open or curl up in a comfy enclosure, this option caters to every feline fancy. An excellent marriage of quality and  innovative versatility.
pros: Penthouse interior features a plush base, breathable mesh sides, plenty of windows for your cat’s viewing pleasure, and a ledge for easy entry
Micro-fleece lined rooftop is ideal for open-air lounging
6 heavy-duty suction cups attach securely to any glass surface
cons: Generous size may not fit smaller windows

customer_reviews.title: Happy cat.
customer_reviews.text: Kitty loves it! I was worried about the top chords because he's always rubbing his face on them and chewing on them, but they are made of a sturdy wire. This company clearly market tested this product and knows cats. Look how happy he is!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it - one is always in or on this ...
customer_reviews.text: Was a bit skeptical about the holding power of this Car window house, but its been up for a couple months now, even through changing temps and humidity and it hasn't wavered and is solid!! My cats love it - one is always in or on this thing, the other (shy kitty) took some time but now they both like lounging on/in the cat penthouse and it holds them BOTH just fine!! LOVE IT!!
customer_reviews.author: Shawna Capp

customer_reviews.title: Very nice double decker
customer_reviews.text: My little kitty loves this. Some days She likes watching the bird feeder from inside and other days She likes stretching out on the "upstairs" balcony for a sun bath. Suction cups are heavy duty and don't release easily, which is good. My kitty is 9lbs and small and has enough room in the interior. There are 3 exits for the lower area 1 on one end and 2 on the long side. I'm not sure this would be comfortable for a big kitty in getting in and out of, but they would like the "upstairs" balcony. If tight on window space and have multiple cats, 2 could enjoy using without crowding each other's space.
customer_reviews.author: PuddzeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: My cat loved this but a strap broke after it was up almost a month.
customer_reviews.author: J. Pease

customer_reviews.title: Great for cats less than 10lbs.... the ledge is wonky for fat boys.
customer_reviews.text: My fat cat looks a little awkward on this. My little girl cat loves it. Stays fixed to winnow well. I wish it was about 3” less wide, because the windows I want to use are standard width.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: ... cross the upper section cups so they would hold better.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it the only problem I had was I had to criss cross the upper section cups so they would hold better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Dangerous to my cats!
customer_reviews.text: The cord came out of the suction cup and the whole thing collapsed with my cats in it! It says there is a one year warranty but no information about it!?
customer_reviews.author: bierbitzch

customer_reviews.title: Since the first day it was installed, my cats ...
customer_reviews.text: Since the first day it was installed, my cats have been using on a daily basis. Bird and critter watching, plus, soaking-up the sun. It's a quality and rugged product that can take the abuse of two very active cats.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Jacob

customer_reviews.title: Great indoor & outdoor
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this! My cats do too! I haven't had any problems with it falling. We even hung one outside and it is great! My cats don't sleep anywhere else...
customer_reviews.author: CAM

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy, My Cat is Obsessed
customer_reviews.text: My 12 lb cat is obsessed with this thing. Took him a few days to trust it, but now he's in it constantly. This thing is big, plenty of room for his big butt to roll around in, but the suction cups are seriously heavy duty. When I first set it up, I put it at the bottom of a sliding glass door (with a few treats on/in it) to let him get used to it without having to jump into. After a few days, he learned it would hold it and now spends all day in this thing. I would definitely recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Madison

customer_reviews.title: Possibly not cat rated
customer_reviews.text: Super cool concept, but the fabric that holds the cable supports ripped right away making it useless. Only one week old. I’m giving it 2 stars only until I get a replacement, hopefully this one was just defective and not poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: motownscrambler

customer_reviews.title: Feline friendly
customer_reviews.text: Is perfect for our fur family! We have 7 cats and we find it to be important for this to be feline friends home. So we put this on the window where my boyfriend works and we always have cats sleeping in it to be close to him. It hasn't fallen and was pretty easy to install.
customer_reviews.author: Jinks

customer_reviews.title: An absolute must for cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this condo! They are constantly trying to push each other off the top of it since that seems to be the best spot for getting some sun in the window. Attaches easily and is STRONG, I never worry about it falling. I also set up the bird feeders on a pole right outside of the window it clings to so they get a lot of entertainment while relaxing. So far it has been easy to clean and detach. I highly recommend this if you have cats who love to window gaze.
customer_reviews.author: OddGabbs

customer_reviews.title: My two cats love their window to the world
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love, love, love this window seat. It's soft, comfortable, and easy to assembly and sturdy. I bought this three months ago, slightly skeptical about the suction cup aspect of the product, but I can honestly say, that the suction cups haven't moved one millimeter since the initial installation. My cats, Whiskey and Gin, are in it every day basking in the sunlight. They often sleep in it at night as well. It will be interesting to see if cold temperatures of winter effect the suction cups. I can't recommend this product enough!
customer_reviews.author: Eric G. Samuelson

customer_reviews.title: So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good! I read people having issues with the suction after a few months, so I’ll update if it falls. I’ve taken it down once to clean the window and used rubbing alcohol on both the suctions and window itself, so hopefully that will help to periodically clean them. I also make sure the air bubbles are completely out by pressing down and smoothing the suctions out. Both of my cats love it and they use it more than any other fixture or furniture. They’ll both hang out and play on it together and it stays nice and sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: M

customer_reviews.title: somehow smelly, but alright
customer_reviews.text: Came with a strong smell but alright. My catS doesn’t like it as much as they loves the previous single platform bed. However, I think they gonna get used to it. Overall, it’s easy to assemble, looks sturdy for now, the tactile of the fuzzy layer is great, the layer inside the “box” can be taken out which is good. However, the string is too thin, one of my cat loves to chew it, I’m afraid one day he gonna break it with his teeth? Hopefully not. But overall, great quality, wait for my cats to get use to it
customer_reviews.author: Sasha

customer_reviews.title: Love the 2 levels
customer_reviews.text: I love how soft the fur is for this window perch! When comparing the different options, I like that this perch has more for a similar price. Other ones are close to the same price but are only one level. As you can see from the image, my kitty approves. I figured she would love it as she loves sitting in front of the window. No problems with it not holding her or anything. :)
customer_reviews.author: Kasie Mays

customer_reviews.title: Suction issue...
customer_reviews.text: One of the suction pieces keeps falling off... other than that, it's a pretty sturdy piece. Cats seem curious about it so far!
customer_reviews.author: seyoung choi

customer_reviews.title: It’s a hit!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few days ago, and my cats love it! I have 17 and they’ve all been on it. There were 4 chubby kitties on it at one time and it held tight. It is pretty big, so you’ll need a large window to put it in. Super easy to set up. The only thing you need to do is attach 4 suction cups and it’s ready to hang. Be sure to clean the window first for a good adhesion. I definitely recommend and will be purchasing another for an upstairs window.
customer_reviews.author: Kerry Boone

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty LOVES this! We were a bit uneasy ordering it first because we were unsure if she would use it and we weren't sure it would be sturdy enough. It was super easy to assemble and is very sturdy. I think it's definitely the 6 suction cups that get the job done. When it first came in, we placed her blanket up there so that she would get used to it. She no longer needs her blanket there but to say she loves this item would be the understatement of the year. I completely recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jazmin

customer_reviews.title: Cats will love
customer_reviews.text: It’s been a few weeks since I got the penthouse and my cats love it. I put it on the bay window up high so it doesn’t block my view.m when I sit down. I’m struggling with one suction cup but I just probably need to clean it and reapply. One boy is hefty and the other is skinny. I love them using it while I’m working at my table next to the window. I can now enjoy my view without a cozy bed blocking it. And they can still check out what’s going on at night if I close the curtains.
customer_reviews.author: Dana

customer_reviews.title: BEST PURCHASE EVER
customer_reviews.text: This is a game changer! My cat would always want to be on the couch, and I am allergic so it was a big problem for me. Now she lays here most of the day if not the entire day. My cat us pretty heavy and these suction cups work very well! Get it! Your cats will live this!
customer_reviews.author: Anned Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Great quality, worth the money
customer_reviews.text: If it doesn't stick well or slides, try cleaning your window and dry it well. My cats are 17 lbs and 12 lbs and they both feel confident jumping onto this. It feels sturdy. Haven't seen either of my cats as much since getting this thing. They spend all day in it.
customer_reviews.author: bao22

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it, and it's very stable . . .
customer_reviews.text: My 1 year old cat, Sage, loves this. She's an indoor cat, but it's apparent from her preference in toys that she's a birder, as opposed to our last cat that was only interested in 4-legged prey. If your cat is interested in birds, they will love this. Sage spends most of her time stretched out across the top gazing at the birds. I have it attached to a bay window in the living room, with her cat tree a short leap away. Also, the suction cups are remarkably strong - no accidents, and I don't expect any.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: My cat LOVES it!
customer_reviews.text: As we know, cats love to sit and look out the window, this is a perfect, cozy place for them to enjoy the outside and in my case the inside. I have it low to the ground where he can easily go in and out and he loves napping or just sitting and looking out to the room or the outside. He spends a lot of time in his penthouse :)
customer_reviews.author: Basia

customer_reviews.title: Purrfect!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, this may be the best money I’ve ever spent. My kitten absolutely loves this. It was easy to install and I’ve had no problem with the suction after following instructions on how to clean them and the window. I would absolutely recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke S.

customer_reviews.title: kitty crack
customer_reviews.text: This thing was a major hit before we even installed it!!!! The minute we got it out of the box, our kitties were all over it. We bought it to feed our kitties on so that our dogs don't eat their food. Our kitties are young, so we will see how it holds up once they get bigger.
customer_reviews.author: Ashwin Lakshmiratan

customer_reviews.title: Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: My cats hated it at first, but now are fighting over it. Good thing that two cats can go on it at the same time, but I have three. The price is a little big on the higher end, but this product is definitely worth it when compared to previous two I had to throw to garbage.
customer_reviews.author: melly

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it
customer_reviews.text: my cats love this and it saves room in my living room vs the cat tree i had. But the suction cups did not hold up to my combined cats weight (25lb together) so we had to literally attach it to the window with screws.
customer_reviews.author: Mychoice

customer_reviews.title: They love it omg
customer_reviews.text: My cats (2 beautiful black kitties) absolutely love this and share it really well. They like this more than the 3 other cat trees we have, all which cost more than double this. They just love curling up to the window and looking out. This has become the main sleeping spot of one of them :) it’s the single best cat accessory purchase I’ve ever made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazen

customer_reviews.title: not all my kitties like it. The smaller females seem to like it ...
customer_reviews.text: not all my kitties like it. The smaller females seem to like it better than the large males. I replase the suction cups with heavy duty ones..
customer_reviews.author: Moe

customer_reviews.title: Safe and sturdy and holds at least 3 cats!
customer_reviews.text: I love the fact that my fur babies use this... We'll three of them do. There is normally one of the smaller cats inside (some times a second one) and another on top. It's such a nice place for them to relax and watch the birds.
customer_reviews.author: Robert B Stephenson

customer_reviews.title: Our cat loves it!!!
customer_reviews.text: Our cat knew this was for her before we even opened the box! We barely got it suctioned to the window before she jumped on it and started staring out to the backyard. The cubbyhole part has now become her main sleep pad as she knows the dogs can't get to her up there. Awesome purchase!
customer_reviews.author: B KEETZ

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money!
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptical about this product because I read some reviews about the suction cups not sticking properly, but I have had zero issues with it since I bought it. I boiled the suction cups for a few minutes just in case and to allow the cups to loosen up, which really helped. It was easy to put up and my cat loves it. He sleeps on the inside every day, even at night time and he sunbathes on the top section. Great product for a good price and your cat will love it!
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Leassear

customer_reviews.title: My four kitties love this! It seems so study and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My four kitties love this! It seems so study and comfortable. At one point three of our cats were on this (all weighing around 10 pounds) and this thing didn't budge. I would definitely recommend, our cats love napping in it.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Cat tested, cat loved
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves this penthouse! She normally hangs out in my room because it has the best sunbasking spot. I got this is that she could have her own space and stop using my pillows. She is 10 pounds and it holds her well. She loves hiding under the mat inside. I would definitely recommend this penthouse.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Kolzow

customer_reviews.title: My two kitties sit on it together!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this!! Both can be on it at once. One likes to sit at the top, and one inside. The material is sturdy and the suction is very strong. I have it hanging on my sliding glass door. They lay and play on it all day.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cats love to Sunbathe on here!
customer_reviews.text: MY CATS LOVE THIS. Both my cats can sit on this its only ever fallen once. They are about 17lbs combined. They hang out on here all day long!
customer_reviews.author: Hayley heartfield

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My two cats love this thing. Finally a cubby my big cat can for in. The only issues I would say is the one of the suction cups does not stay on. I've had to improvise.
customer_reviews.author: Incognito

customer_reviews.title: Can hold a chonky kitty cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves his penthouse. It is easy to install and is solid enough to hold a very chonky kitty boy (~16 lbs). The inside fleece pad is easy to remove which makes it easier to clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Very impressed with how well suction cups manage to hold the weight of two cats (totaling around 20 lbs). It seems very securely fastened.
customer_reviews.author: Justine Shubert

customer_reviews.title: Best. Purchase. EVER
customer_reviews.text: All of my cats are obsessed with this bed. It stays on the window and doesn't fall even with our 22lb cat. This bed is amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Jamielynn

customer_reviews.title: Quality perch & bed that your cat(s) will love!
customer_reviews.text: This product was just what I expected. It installed in 30 seconds. Rubbed with a touch of catnip so the cats knew it was theirs. It’s very sturdy and secure, my two cats were climbing on it immediately. As you can see from the picture they have become comfortable with it!
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: BUY THIS!
customer_reviews.text: Super easy to install! Just make sure you clean the window and suction cups. My cats LOVE this thing! Super durable and withstands jumping and playtime. Recommended for all cat lovers!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: New Favorite Perch
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this thing! I recently got a puppy and my cats needed a place to hide. It's a good quality and was easy to assemble. I've had no problems with it falling from the window. Both of my cats are 10-12 lbs and chill together on it. One of my cats even does big, forceful leaps to get on it and it is solid! I'm so happy with the product that I'm considering buying another for a different window.
customer_reviews.author: eeifert

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful lounger and very safe!
customer_reviews.text: This is luxury for a cat! High quality and I’m more than pleased with the security this offers! This is definitely worth purchasing!
customer_reviews.author: Pinnipeds

customer_reviews.title: but it feels sturdy and think it can handle my two fatt cats ...
customer_reviews.text: its too large, wont fit any windows in my house :(. but it feels sturdy and think it can handle my two fatt cats (15lbs each)
customer_reviews.author: Curtis

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Our kitty is a rescue and VERY nervous about being in our livingroom ( no idea why) but I put this in the window and he loves it!! Really easy to put up and the suction is really good. Definitely a good purchase
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality, happy cats!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this, and so do my cats. I have one large and one smallish cat, and they both fit. They like that it’s a double decker, but sometimes they sleep together on top. It’s very sturdy, they like to play fight on it and it hasn’t budged.
customer_reviews.author: Brittni Burns

customer_reviews.title: Easy install and not flimsy
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for one of these for a while. I finally found this one and knew it would be able to hold my two cats. The bottom is so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: Candice

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this. Three of them can sleep on it at once. I had my doubts about it being held on by suction cups, but it is very secure.
customer_reviews.author: Jls

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this window mount perch for my cat a few months ago. She absolutely loves it. We placed it in the window of our main living room and she hangs out there most of the time she's in the house so that she can look out over everything and everybody. The suction power is great on the windows and it has been in place since we installed it over two months ago.
customer_reviews.author: Jean Hatch-Tiedeman

customer_reviews.title: It was easy to install, it looks nice and our kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: Our kitten loves it! I was worried he would immediately ruin the anchor « wires » as he seemed far too interested in them at first, but I adjusted them and moved them out a bit. Now he just wants to be on top of the « box » or inside of it. He goes there on his own to relax during the morning and evening.
customer_reviews.author: AmyBeth

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny...
customer_reviews.text: Holds up very well. Auction cups ate amazing and do not pop off but you must follow the instructions and clean both the cups and window very well. My cats stay in this all the time and it is so strong that they both can sleep in it at the same time.
customer_reviews.author: kim davis

customer_reviews.title: Nice while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: I would have had this 2 years in April but today both of the suspension cables broke loose with my two cats (20lbs combined) in and on the perch. Fortunately no injuries, but be warned that this is only going to last so long.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: bored and wanted to buy
customer_reviews.text: the coolbro 12lb cat likes it , the chubbster 18lb cat doesn’t like it as it could be wobbly for him
customer_reviews.author: melissa

customer_reviews.title: My two cats approve
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this thing. I got one as a gift a few years back. That one eventually broke. The wire that goes through the holes of the suction cups actually cut through them. I bought another one recently to replace that and it looks like they made some design improvements. Now the wires are coated in a plastic so they don’t cut through the suction cups as easily.
customer_reviews.author: Jakov

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: My 10lb cat loves this! Sometimes we take it down and he still goes inside
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: my cat loves it. She spends time watching the squirrel feeder I set up outside of the window
customer_reviews.author: me

customer_reviews.title: Happy Kitty and awesome Penthouse!!!
customer_reviews.text: The best penthouse for your kitty. Spooky loves it and it’s perfect for him to watch birds and still enjoy a breeze from the window. Sturdy and comfortable too. A well made product that’s very easy to set up!!!
customer_reviews.author: Marty

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 9 year old cat LOVES this thing. She stays in it!
customer_reviews.author: Stevie Headley

customer_reviews.title: Great product- holds at least 32lbs without a problem
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 bengal cats. The male weighs 22lbs. The female 8 lbs. they both jump upon the stand at the same time- sometimes even on the same platform. They love it more than there cat tree.Have never had to reattach suction ( make sure you follow the directions and use alcohol!)
customer_reviews.author: CJ Pipoly

customer_reviews.title: cats love it
customer_reviews.text: cats love it.. they get to look out window.. also good 'escape' venue.. when other cats are chasing them.
customer_reviews.author: private

customer_reviews.title: My boys love it!
customer_reviews.text: Part of it started to rip after a few months, I was able to fix it. But my Bengal kittens love it! They spend all day in it. It’s the perfect size for 2. I will definitely be purchasing this again!
customer_reviews.author: April Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Bought for my grandcat
customer_reviews.text: She loves her new cat perch. My daughter was so happy to receive this as a gift. We highly recommend for all the cat lovers out there.
customer_reviews.author: Angie L

customer_reviews.title: Best cat window bed
customer_reviews.text: This is more well made than i expected. I love it and so do the my babies.
customer_reviews.author: Tesla9313

customer_reviews.title: Definitely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was a little skeptical at first, but our cat loves this. She spends so much time playing and sleeping on this. Honestly one of the best things we've gotten her
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: Best cat toy ever
customer_reviews.text: Cat is in love with it! VERY sturdy for my 12 lb cat and the kitten. Super easy to assemble! Just make sure to CLEAN THE WINDOWS AND CUPS
customer_reviews.author: Ashton

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! They both fit in at the same time and even in Canadian winter it still sticks to the window! I just wish there were supports available to install inside the meshed area, I wanted to use it in the car but it was too big for the window
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: The first time my cat hopped up here the suction cups failed. And yes I followed all the instructions. Scared her to death. Once she decided to give it a try again, one of the strings broke off from its attachment, leaving it completely unusable.
customer_reviews.author: Tessa

customer_reviews.title: Gr
customer_reviews.text: My cat is obsessed. We have a very small apartment so the extra climbing/exploring space is wonderful. The top and cushion inside are very soft and comfy too. Super sturdy so far but we have a kitten so we'll see.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have two kitties and they love their penthouse. Together they weigh about 15 lbs and it holds up just fine, even when they wrestle in it.
customer_reviews.author: chris

customer_reviews.title: My cat approves.
customer_reviews.text: My cat likes it! He's only eight or nine pounds so its quite roomy for him. He had a hard time figuring out how to get up and in at first, but now he's got it.
customer_reviews.author: Molly E.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty paradise
customer_reviews.text: My cat now lives in this. We can’t keep her out. It is securely placed on the window. There are no issues with her jumping on it from the floor and having it move. Highly recommended for any cats that sit in windows.
customer_reviews.author: Nicolas Rubio

customer_reviews.title: #1 cat condo/window perch!!! BEST ONE AVAILABLE!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! I love it in my cat loves it. We have it hanging on our back sliding glass door so she can sit on it and look out the window at the porch and watch the birds and squirrels. It is definitely big enough for even a big cat and it is made incredibly well it is very good material and I have absolutely no complaints at all it was well worth the $55 I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Robbi layne

customer_reviews.title: My cat boys love this
customer_reviews.text: We have 4 cats and they seem to like sleeping on top of it and playing in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jacqui Letran, Author of the Award-Winning Words of Wisdom for Teens book series

customer_reviews.title: Suction cups work well
customer_reviews.text: I have two cats, one about 12 pounds and the other around 9 lbs. 20ish lbs total, both almost 2 year old cats, so they’re still full of energy, after about 3 months I haven’t had any suction cup problems with my cats being absolutely crazy all over the hut. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quick love!
customer_reviews.text: It was up less than one hour and it already had captured the fancy of my babies 😸
customer_reviews.author: Cucciolit

customer_reviews.title: Great window cat condo!  Your cats will love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Once my cats got comfortable with it, I find them in it everytime. They love it.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Moneymaker

customer_reviews.title: MY CAT IS OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: Love this window seat for my cat and she loves it too! She spends all day and night lounging/watching the people and birds go by. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: My cat really likes to lay on top and take a nap. He doesn’t even try to go inside. It is very sturdy and nice quality!
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: Missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: This seller did not disclose that any pieces were missing and 4 out of 6 suction cups were not with item. I can maybe go to a hardware store to get more but hopefully they will have the right size. Not sure yet.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Seems sturdy so far.
customer_reviews.text: Little kitten loves it so far. She plays on it and sleeps on it and so far it has not moved. Can’t get it to look perfectly even on one side, even used level to make sure it was level.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Deisler

customer_reviews.title: Cat paradise
customer_reviews.text: My cat lives in her hammock. She sleeps in the middle and watches birds all day. Sturdier than the single hammock I bought before
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: the best one I've ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing window bed I have ever used. My cat loves it, went on it during installation and wouldn't get off. Suction cups are so strong I couldn't pull them off. Great for bird watching, human watching or any type of imaginary watching for your cat or cats. Love love love, highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: YiNi Hou

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This perch is amazing!!! My cats are in heaven. It’s a favorite new spot for both to nap and play anytime of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Jami Mumper

customer_reviews.title: Yes
customer_reviews.text: My kitty loves it especially after I throw some catnip on it!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole Martinez

customer_reviews.title: ripped support cable connection
customer_reviews.text: great bed. All my cats love it, even my 24lb Savanah, however, after 1 month of having it, the connection for the support cable ripped on one side. the other side is still perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Kemnitz

customer_reviews.title: A cat favorite!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this! They are now able to look out the window and over the deck railing. It has held 4 cats at a time, each weighing between 6 and 14 pounds. I would recommend this to any cat lover. My only suggestion...I had to use velcro on the bottom of the inside mat to keep it in place.
customer_reviews.author: Julie

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: Both of the cats love it! It can hold both of my cats at the same time (although they don’t like to share). Highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Nami

customer_reviews.title: perfect for my cats
customer_reviews.text: my cats love it. they spend hours looking through the window and taking the sun. the suction work perfect and its easy to install
customer_reviews.author: Arelis

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put up. My cat loves it! It's absolutely her favorite place in the house now!
customer_reviews.author: JTG

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 12lb cat loves this! It’s very sturdy and well made! Also, It looks a bit different in the pic I took because I put a pillow cover that smells like her on top so she would jump up there; but it looks just live the advertised picture.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Chappell

customer_reviews.title: Amazinglingawesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is so great! My cat loves this. He sleeps in it every night, He also sits in it to look out the window and loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor Denfeld

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy as heck
customer_reviews.text: Follow instructions and it works brilliantly!! My two boys love it.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly R.

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it.
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it. He uses it all the time. I’ve never had any problems with it!
customer_reviews.author: Kiley Krause

customer_reviews.title: Happy Cats!
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this perch. It’s strong enough to withstand their wrestling and perfect for napping!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Great for even large cats!
customer_reviews.text: My cats LOVE this, and they are pretty picky. Lol. I posted a picture of just my cats so you could see their size. Hopefully that helps you decide on whether to buy this item or not.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Elaine

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: My kitties love this. They hang out on it all day. It was super easy to install and it's very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Cat Lady

customer_reviews.title: Kitties Love It
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Strong. Both of my cats even got on top together- good size and product for two cats.
customer_reviews.author: KW

product_meta.title: K&H Pet Products EZ Mount Penthouse Gray/Black 19" x 23" x 9.5" Kitty Sill
product_meta.description: Color:Gray/Black| Product Packaging:Standard PackagingThe patent pending EZ mount penthouse will be a cat’s most favorite hangout. Secure built-in ledge makes getting into the penthouse a breeze. Open mesh windows give pets a great View of the outdoors. Comes with a removable plush microfleece pad plus the top of the penthouse is lined with microfleece for comfortable resting. Can accommodate multiple cats with the extra strong suction cups provided. Removable cover for easy machine wash care. The EZ mount penthouse can be removed and stored easily with its collapsible design and is hands down luxury built for the most pampered cat. One year limited warranty.
feature_bullets: The perfect window mounted entertainment room for your kitty
Built-in ledge for easy entrance and exit
Mounts to most windows or glass doors
Accommodates multiple cats with the Extra strong Suction Cup system
